That is very strange, since I tried the keygen myself on every game before I uploaded.

I've installed all these games on my sons computer also without problems.

So here are instructions again.
1. See so your game doesn't run.
2. Open the Keygen
3. Click "Open" in the keygen and browse to the game you wanna unlook by choosing it's .EXE file.
4. Wait a little
5. Click "Generate" in the keygen
6. Now the games unlock code should be copied to your clipboard and all you have to do is open the game you generated a code for and it should be unlocked.

Any questions?

How to get full games:
1. Instals unlocker
2. Show hidden files
3. Install & run the game
4. Go to the folder and unlock the only hidden .exe
5. Copy the hidden file and rename it
6. Exit the game
7. Rename original exe to xx.exe.bak
8. Rename hidden exe like original exe an set not hiden
9. Play the full game now
